answerText: cytokinesis[10] This is the protein structure on the metaphase chromosome where spindle fibers attach. They usually assemble near centromeres.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 10 | 15 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Syncytia are created when mitosis is not followed by this process, which sees an actin-myosin contractile ring forming a cleavage furrow. For 10 points each: [10] Name this phase of the cell cycle which follows telophase, in which a cell is split into two daughter cells.
